statements: DELETE FROM PatientRecords WHERE patient_id = 101 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM PatientRecords WHERE age > 50 AND medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%';
DELETE FROM MedicalRecords WHERE record_date < '2022-01-01' AND diagnosis = 'Cancer';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'F' AND date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Common cold'
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 123 AND doctor = 'Dr. Smith'
DELETE FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date < '2022-01-01' AND reason = 'Follow-up appointment'
DELETE FROM Appointments WHERE date = '2022-01-15' AND time = '10:00';
DELETE FROM Medical_History WHERE patient_id = 100 AND diagnosis = 'Fever';
